about_the_game:
We're celebrating two years of RuneScape on Steam! Toast the occasion with the Forgemaster Wyrm Bundle and get more out of your adventures in Gielinor.

The Forgemaster Wyrm Bundle features:

Forgemaster Wyrm Pet
35 Treasure Hunter keys
2 Premier Tokens
400 RuneCoins

Note
· The Forgemaster Wyrm Bundle items are not tradeable or refundable.
· The Forgemaster Wyrm Bundle is a one-time purchase and is not recurring. Recurring memberships can only be purchased via the in-game interface.

The Forgemaster Wyrm Bundle features:

legal_notice: Jagex®, RuneScape® and Old School RuneScape® are registered and/or unregistered trade marks of Jagex Limited in the United Kingdom, the United States and other countries.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.8 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3+ @ 2.4+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 7xxx +
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play, offers in-game purchases. Platforms / devices with 32-bit PowerPC CPUs are officially no longer supported by RuneScape. Starting with MacOS 10.8, Apple supports 64-bit devices, only.

name: RuneScape Forgemaster Wyrm Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3+/AMD @ 2.4+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel i3+/AMD @ 2.4+ GHz
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to play, offers in-game purchases. The following operating systems are no longer officially supported by RuneScape, and you may not be able to play if using them: Windows 95, 98, ME, XP

short_description: We're celebrating two years of RuneScape on Steam! Toast the occasion with the Forgemaster Wyrm Bundle and get more out of your adventures in Gielinor.
